snippet: David A. Patterson, a professor at Washington University in St. Louis, has firsthand knowledge of the substance abuse and other problems facing American Indian communities.
abstract: Profile of David A Patterson, Washington University professor, who has used his firsthand knowledge of substance abuse and other problems facing Native American communities in his groundbreaking research in the field.
lead_paragraph: David A. Patterson, a professor at Washington University in St. Louis, has firsthand knowledge of the substance abuse and other problems facing American Indian communities.
